name: bunsen-features
description: Specifying big data for fun and profit by example

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=test DISPLAY=:99.0 dill features/ --driver=firefox --require util/ --require step_definitions/ --require widgets/ -f pretty
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test DISPLAY=:99.0 node-debug --web-port 8081 --debug-port 5859 dill features/ --driver=firefox --require util/ --require step_definitions/ --require widgets/ -f pretty
